message.content: This question requires some knowledge about animal behavior and mating rituals. Many animals use visual cues to attract a mate, and one common way is by having beautiful and vibrant tail plumage. Option (A) is incorrect because social networking and dating apps are human inventions and not used by animals. Option (C) is anthropomorphic and not based on animal behavior. Option (D) is also incorrect because animals do not have meet ups and social gatherings in the same way humans do.

Option (A) is incorrect because social networking and dating apps are human inventions and not used by animals. Option (C) is anthropomorphizing animal behavior, as animals do not have the ability to ask their friends for advice. Option (D) is also anthropomorphizing animal behavior, as animals do not have social gatherings or meetups in the same way humans do.
